alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 28 at 5:25AM AKST until December 28 at 10:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Western Kenai Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog has developed over the western Kenai Peninsula this morning. Expect reduced visibility to one quarter mile or less at times, especially along the Sterling Highway from Soldotna to Homer.
info.instruction: A dense fog advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
